${modID}:FuturesightFumes.NAME: Futuresight Fumes
${modID}:FuturesightFumes.DESCRIPTION: Scry !M!. NL If the top card of your draw pile has a ${modID}:Base of 2 or more, ${modID}:Infuse [#90e2e8]Aer[]. Otherwise, ${modID}:Infuse [#4f52ff]Aqua[].

${modID}:TripleThreat.NAME: Triple Threat
${modID}:TripleThreat.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you attack this enemy, gain !M! Vigor. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:WildRush.NAME: Wild Rush
${modID}:WildRush.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Infuse [#90e2e8]Aer[]. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:Neutralization.NAME: Neutralization
${modID}:Neutralization.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Catalyst. NL Deal damage equal to the total ${modID}:Base of your hand.

${modID}:DustUp.NAME: Dust-Up
${modID}:DustUp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you ${modID}:Infused [#bf7330]Terra[] this turn, gain !B! Block.

${modID}:BlisterBlast.NAME: Blister Blast
${modID}:BlisterBlast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL If you ${modID}:Infused [#f22424]Ignis[] this turn, apply !${modID}:2M! instead.

${modID}:AdaptiveAssault.NAME: Adaptive Assault
${modID}:AdaptiveAssault.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy intends to attack, ${modID}:Infuse [#bf7330]Terra[]. Otherwise, ${modID}:Infuse [#f22424]Ignis[].

${modID}:EfficientPlanning.NAME: Efficient Planning
${modID}:EfficientPlanning.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Catalyst. NL Reduce the cost of all cards in hand by !M! for the turn.

${modID}:ThinkFast.NAME: Think Fast!
${modID}:ThinkFast.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Infuse a random Flask. NL ${modID}:Withdrawal: ${modID}:Infuse [#4f52ff]Aqua[] instead. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:PotentMiasma.NAME: Potent Miasma
${modID}:PotentMiasma.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL ${modID}:Withdrawal: Enemy loses !${modID}:STR! Strength this turn.

${modID}:Tremorsense.NAME: Tremorsense
${modID}:Tremorsense.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Scry !M!. ${modID}:Infuse [#90e2e8]Aer[]. NL If the top card of your draw pile has a ${modID}:Base of 2 or more, ${modID}:Infuse [#bf7330]Terra[].

${modID}:TidalTincture.NAME: Tidal Tincture
${modID}:TidalTincture.DESCRIPTION: The first time each combat you ${modID}:Infuse [#4f52ff]Aqua[], draw 1 additional card.

${modID}:ClairvoyantCrosswinds.NAME: Clairvoyant Crosswinds
${modID}:ClairvoyantCrosswinds.DESCRIPTION: The first time each combat you ${modID}:Infuse [#90e2e8]Aer[], Scry 2 first.

${modID}:SeepingSolvent.NAME: Seeping Solvent
${modID}:SeepingSolvent.DESCRIPTION: The first time each turn you ${modID}:Infuse [#4f52ff]Aqua[], reduce the cost of all ${modID}:Catalysts in hand by 2.

${modID}:EncroachingEarth.NAME: Encroaching Earth
${modID}:EncroachingEarth.DESCRIPTION: The first time each combat you ${modID}:Infuse [#bf7330]Terra[], apply 2 Weak to ALL enemies.

${modID}:SunderSalt.NAME: Sunder Salt
${modID}:SunderSalt.DESCRIPTION: The first time each combat you ${modID}:Infuse [#f22424]Ignis[], apply 2 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

${modID}:TurbulenceTonic.NAME: Turbulence Tonic
${modID}:TurbulenceTonic.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the cost of an additional card when you ${modID}:Infuse [#90e2e8]Aer[].

${modID}:BagBlock.NAME: Bag Block
${modID}:BagBlock.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ${modID}:Infuse a random Flask twice.

${modID}:SuperbSolution.NAME: Superb Solution
${modID}:SuperbSolution.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! additional Block for each unique Flask ${modID}:Infused this turn.

${modID}:SeismicShell.NAME: Seismic Shell
${modID}:SeismicShell.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Catalyst. NL Gain !B! Block. NL At the start of your next turn, deal damage to ALL enemies equal to double your remaining Block.

${modID}:MomentousMaelstrom.NAME: Momentous Maelstrom
${modID}:MomentousMaelstrom.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Catalyst. NL Draw cards until your hand is full. Gain [E] equal to your maximum [E].

${modID}:ArsonArmor.NAME: Arson Armor
${modID}:ArsonArmor.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you are attacked this turn, ${modID}:Infuse [#f22424]Ignis[].

${modID}:Brainstorm.NAME: Brainstorm
${modID}:Brainstorm.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Put a card from your hand on top of your draw pile. NL ${modID}:Infuse [#90e2e8]Aer[].

${modID}:BefuddlingBrew.NAME: Befuddling Brew
${modID}:BefuddlingBrew.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL At the start of your next turn, apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL ${modID}:Withdrawal: Apply Weak this turn instead.

${modID}:AlacritousArrangement.NAME: Alacritous Arrangement
${modID}:AlacritousArrangement.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL ${modID}:Withdrawal: Reduce the cost of ${modID}:Withdrawal cards drawn by 1 for the turn.

${modID}:SneakySip.NAME: Sneaky Sip
${modID}:SneakySip.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Put a random ${modID}:Withdrawal card from your draw pile into your hand.{!M!|1<|1= NL Your next ${modID}:Withdrawal card this turn activate even if you have ${modID}:Infused.|@= NL Your next !M! ${modID}:Withdrawal cards this turn activate even if you have ${modID}:Infused.}
${modID}:SneakySip.old desc: {@@}The next {!M!|1=time|@=!M! times} you ${modID}:Infuse do{!M!|1=es} not disable ${modID}:Withdrawal effects.

${modID}:Temperance.NAME: Temperance
${modID}:Temperance.DESCRIPTION: Play the first card in your draw pile that costs !M! or less. NL ${modID}:Withdrawal: Repeat this. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Blitzlixir.NAME: Blitz-lixir
${modID}:Blitzlixir.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Innate. NL {!M!|0=Do nothing. |repeat=${modID}:Infuse [#90e2e8]Aer[]. Draw a card. }NL Exhaust.

${modID}:SturdySubstrate.NAME: Sturdy Substrate
${modID}:SturdySubstrate.DESCRIPTION: {@@}${modID}:Infuse [#bf7330]Terra[]{!M!|1=|2= twice|3= thrice|@= !M! times}. NL Block is not removed at the start of your next turn.

${modID}:Thermoblast.NAME: Thermoblast
${modID}:Thermoblast.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Infuse [#f22424]Ignis[]. If this kills an enemy, ${modID}:Infuse [#f22424]Ignis[] {!M!|1=again|@=!M! more times}.

${modID}:VialVolley.NAME: Vial Volley
${modID}:VialVolley.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Repeat for each unique Flask ${modID}:Infused this turn.

${modID}:Dissolution.NAME: Dissolution
${modID}:Dissolution.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Withdrawal: Shuffle this card into your draw pile.

${modID}:CatalyticCombustion.NAME: Catalytic Combustion
${modID}:CatalyticCombustion.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Catalyst. NL Deal !D! damage to the closest enemy. NL If this kills an enemy, deal double the excess to the next closest.

${modID}:QuicksilverBlitz.NAME: Quicksilver Blitz
${modID}:QuicksilverBlitz.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Catalyst. NL Deal !D! damage. For every !M! unblocked damage dealt, reduce the cost of a random card in your hand by 1 for the turn.

${modID}:OneTwo.NAME: One-Two
${modID}:OneTwo.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL This Attack does not consume Vigor.

${modID}:RapidsResponse.NAME: Rapids Response
${modID}:RapidsResponse.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL If you ${modID}:Infused [#4f52ff]Aqua[] this turn, gain{!M!|0= nothing|repeat= [E]}.

${modID}:SuddenSurge.NAME: Sudden Surge
${modID}:SuddenSurge.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Infuse [#4f52ff]Aqua[]. NL Deal damage equal to the total ${modID}:Base of the cards drawn. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:SuddenSurge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Scry !M!. NL ${modID}:Infuse [#4f52ff]Aqua[]. NL Deal damage equal to the total ${modID}:Base of the cards drawn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:WhirlingDebris.NAME: Whirling Debris
${modID}:WhirlingDebris.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL If you hit at least !M! enemies, ${modID}:Infuse [#bf7330]Terra[] twice.

${modID}:SubstanceSpree.NAME: Substance Spree
${modID}:SubstanceSpree.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies X times. NL ${modID}:Withdrawal: Gain half of X [E].

${modID}:FlaskFracture.NAME: Flask Fracture
${modID}:FlaskFracture.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Your next ${modID}:Infusion this turn is cancelled.

${modID}:TertiaryIngredient.NAME: Tertiary Ingredient
${modID}:TertiaryIngredient.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Can only be played if you have ${modID}:Infused exactly !M! time{!M!|1=|@=s} this turn. NL Deal !D! damage.
${modID}:TertiaryIngredient.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Can only be played if you have ${modID}:Infused exactly !M! time{!M!|1=|@=s} this turn. NL Deal !D! damage.

${modID}:BufferedSolution.NAME: Buffered Solution
${modID}:BufferedSolution.DESCRIPTION: The first time each combat you ${modID}:Infuse [#bf7330]Terra[] and [#4f52ff]Aqua[] in the same turn, prevent the next time you would lose HP.

${modID}:OxidizingAgent.NAME: Oxidizing Agent
${modID}:OxidizingAgent.DESCRIPTION: The first time each turn you ${modID}:Infuse [#f22424]Ignis[] and [#90e2e8]Aer[], put the lowest cost Attack from your draw pile into your hand.

${modID}:BernoullisPrinciple.NAME: Bernoulli's Principle
${modID}:BernoullisPrinciple.DESCRIPTION: The first time each turn you ${modID}:Infuse [#90e2e8]Aer[], ${modID}:Infuse [#4f52ff]Aqua[].

${modID}:FulminatingPhial.NAME: Fulminating Phial
${modID}:FulminatingPhial.DESCRIPTION: When you ${modID}:Infuse [#bf7330]Terra[] or [#f22424]Ignis[], increase the effect of the other by !M! until their next ${modID}:Infusion this combat.

${modID}:AcidicAcetate.NAME: Acidic Acetate
${modID}:AcidicAcetate.DESCRIPTION: The first time each turn you ${modID}:Infuse [#4f52ff]Aqua[], gain Vigor equal to the total ${modID}:Base of the cards drawn.

${modID}:EarthenEchoes.NAME: Earthen Echoes
${modID}:EarthenEchoes.DESCRIPTION: The first time each combat you ${modID}:Infuse [#bf7330]Terra[] and [#90e2e8]Aer[] in the same turn, create a copy of the lowest cost Skill in your hand.

${modID}:TeetotalRejection.NAME: Teetotal Rejection
${modID}:TeetotalRejection.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL ${modID}:Withdrawal: Apply !M! Vulnerable instead.
${modID}:TeetotalRejection.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL ${modID}:Withdrawal: Apply !M! Vulnerable.

${modID}:Consumption.NAME: Consumption
${modID}:Consumption.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, increase the Vigor gained from [#f22424]Ignis[] by !M! permanently. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:FlamingConclusion.NAME: Flaming Conclusion
${modID}:FlamingConclusion.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL For every !M! damage dealt, ${modID}:Infuse [#f22424]Ignis[].

${modID}:CascadeCrush.NAME: Cascade Crush
${modID}:CascadeCrush.DESCRIPTION: {@@}${modID}:Infuse [#4f52ff]Aqua[] X{!M!|0=|1=+1|2=+2|@= + !M!} times. NL If the total ${modID}:Base of the cards drawn is at least 4, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.
${modID}:CascadeCrush.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Innate. NL ${modID}:Infuse [#4f52ff]Aqua[] X{!M!|0=|1=+1|2=+2|@= + !M!} times. NL If the total ${modID}:Base of the cards drawn is at least 4, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:SackSmack.NAME: Sack Smack
${modID}:SackSmack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${modID}:Infuse a random Flask !M! times.
${modID}:SackSmack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Choose a Flask to ${modID}:Infuse !M! times.

${modID}:Insolubility.NAME: Insolubility
${modID}:Insolubility.DESCRIPTION: Your ${modID}:Withdrawal effects trigger twice next turn. NL Draw !M! cards next turn.

${modID}:EmergencyEarthworks.NAME: Emergency Earthworks
${modID}:EmergencyEarthworks.DESCRIPTION: {@@}${modID}:Infuse [#bf7330]Terra[]{!M!|1=|@= !M! times}. NL ${modID}:Infuse [#bf7330]Terra[] for each enemy in combat.
${modID}:EmergencyEarthworks.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Innate. NL ${modID}:Infuse [#bf7330]Terra[]{!M!|1=|@= !M! times}. NL ${modID}:Infuse [#bf7330]Terra[] for each enemy in combat.

${modID}:Pyroclasticlysm.NAME: Pyroclasticlysm
${modID}:Pyroclasticlysm.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Catalyst. NL For !M! turns, whenever you deal attack damage gain !${modID}:M2! Block, and whenever you gain Block, deal !${modID}:M3! damage to a random enemy. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Crystallization.NAME: Crystallization
${modID}:Crystallization.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Catalyst. NL Gain !B! Block for each card in your hand. NL For !M! turns, whenever you Block damage, deal twice as much to a random enemy. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Cavitation.NAME: Cavitation
${modID}:Cavitation.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Catalyst. NL For !M! turns, whenever you draw a card, deal damage to a random enemy equal to the total ${modID}:Base of your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Convection.NAME: Convection
${modID}:Convection.DESCRIPTION: {@@}${modID}:Catalyst. NL {!M!|1=This turn|@=For !M! turns}, whenever you play a card for less than its ${modID}:Base, play a copy of it. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Saltation.NAME: Saltation
${modID}:Saltation.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Catalyst. NL For !M! turns, whenever you gain Block, draw a card. NL When your hand is full, reduce the cost of your hand to 0 for the turn and become unable to draw additional cards for the turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Effervescence.NAME: Effervescence
${modID}:Effervescence.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Catalyst. NL Scry !M!. NL Play the top card of your draw pile !M! times and Exhaust it. NL Exhaust.
